name: Soumya Agrawal
about: I am a Fifth-year student pursuing a Dual Degree course with a master's in Financial Engineering from the Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur. I am passionate about developing innovative solutions that combine cutting-edge technology with a deep understanding of customers' needs and user experience. My interest in the field of Product and Finance stems from an innate passion to overcome the challenges encountered by an institution in its field of endeavor. Towards this end, beyond my academics, my professional experience is focused on striving to expand my proficiency thereof. A combination of strong analytical acumen and mature communication skills is something I have developed over the course of my education. I love reading about different businesses.

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: æfterschool is an early-stage startup aiming to provide a gamified learning environment and make students’ screen time productive.• Recruited 12 interns and supervised the development of the website and content for the platform (9 courses, 450 worksheets, 200 blogs).• Reduced development cost by 40% and engaged in daily meetings with the tech and content team to keep the product cycle on track• Contacted 300+ users to understand their experience and pain points with the product, created insights, and updated the platform, as a result. • Increased user registration by 70% and Instagram followers by 100% through marketing campaigns and school ambassador programs.• Pitched the platform to multiple school principals and established an active user base of 500+ students from class 6th to 12th.

experience.title: Research Analyst
experience.description: •Among the few interns who worked under Mr. Pranjal Jain to generate Trading Recommendations and Reports for the clients•Used strategies based on VWAP, Stochastic, RSI, Bollinger Bands, Moving Averages, and Fibonacci Retracement Method•Generated Targets and Stop-Losses based on Indicators, Resistance-Support level, Candlestick patterns, and Volume Analysis

experience.title: Core Team Member
experience.description: Successfully organized the flagship event 54th Inter IIT Sports Meet with a team of 20 members. Managed food, accommodation, and transportation of over 2.5k participants from 21 IITs.Ensured smooth conduct of sports match for around 8 days. Coordinated the operations of the five informal nights including both National and International Artists. Headed a team of 10 associate members under my mentorship.
